data.actual_result: The video continues to play as if the Overlay is still open
data.expected_result: The video should either pause completely or temporarily pause until you re-open the Overlay
data.short_description: Video players continue to play after closing the Overlay
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Overlay in a game - Find a YouTube video and play it (preferably one that has sound) - Close the Overlay and observe
